getDeclaredMethods

public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.reflect.Method> getDeclaredMethods(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                                                                java.lang.Class upto)
Gets a collection of methods declared in a specified range of a given class' hierarchy.

Parameters:
clazz - Class to inspect.
upto - Methods declared in this class and its subclasses will be included. Any methods declared in superclasses will be ignored.
Returns:
Collection of methods declared within the specified range.

initialize

public static void initialize(java.lang.Object bean,
                              org.springframework.web.context.WebApplicationContext context,
                              java.lang.Class clazz)
Bean initialization method. Uses reflection to determine properties for which auto-wiring may be appropriate. Subsequently attempts to retrieve appropriate beans from the WebApplicationContext and set them locally.

Parameters:
bean - Bean to initialize.
context - WebApplicationContext containing Spring beans.
clazz - Type of Sprout. This is used to determine which declared methods are candidates for auto-wiring.
